                   int col,

        Fills all the pixels in the data array belonging to this pixel with regard to the grid
        Parameters:
        data - The canvas pixel array that holds the canvas data
        x - The x coordinate to fill
        y - The y coordinate to fill
        factor - The factor the canvas is enlarged with
        col - The colour to fill the pixels with
        width - The width of the ImageData object belonging to canvas pixel array data
